name: Second Chance (itch) (Saksham Shah)
description:
Shoot down all the enemies and rewind to the past to save yourself before you die!

Controls
  • WASD to move
  • Mouse to aim
  • Click to shoot
How to play
  • Dodge all the enemies and shoot them to kill them!
  • If you get hit, time will rewind, giving you a chance to save your past self:
    • Pay attention to which enemy killed you, and when you go to the past, kill them before they fire the fatal shot!
    • If you fail to save yourself, it's game over.
  • After a rewind, there is a short cooldown before you can rewind again - if you die before this cooldown is over, you lose.
  • Shoot enemies in quick succession to score higher and higher combos for massive high scores!
  • There are 3 types of enemies:
    • Triangles will constantly shoot at you, sometimes getting enraged and burst firing a few predictive shots!
    • Spikes stay still and kill you if you hit them. Watch out though - they spawn where they think you're going, to try and trip you up!
    • Squares move quite slowly towards you, but shoot them and they split into two much faster mini-squares!
  • Play at one of 5 difficulty levels: Easy, Normal, Hard, Insane and Impossible.
    • Playing at harder difficulties is obviously more challenging, but it does make getting high scores a lot easier because you can reach higher combos!
    • There is also a Tutorial that you should play first, to get used to the rewind mechanics.
  • How long will you last? Feel free to comment your best times and scores below!
Tools used
  • p5.js with p5ui.js
  • Bosca Ceoil
  • sfxr

Created by Saksham Shah for the Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2
